title: Bourgoin and Morris on Maroon culture - claim

content.question: According to Source 2, which of the following was a reason why maroon communities “inspired terror” among some enslavers in the United States?

choices.label: They allowed Atlantic creoles to become political leaders.
They stockpiled weapons and armed themselves to resist re-enslavement.
They organized churches that helped them to engage in political organizing.
They engaged in resistance against slavery by breaking tools and stealing food from enslavers.

content.answer: They stockpiled weapons and armed themselves to resist re-enslavement.

topic.text: 2.15: Maroon Societies and Autonomous Black Communities
